segments.advisor_message: Thank you for your time today. To start, could you please share where you are currently domiciled? This will help us get a better understanding of your overall tax situation.
segments.client_message: Sure, I’m living in the UK right now. I’ve been here for a few years actually. Oh, and just to let you know, I am a tax resident here as well.

segments.advisor_message: That’s helpful, thank you. Now, can you tell me about your employment status currently? It would also be useful to know if you have an employer and your occupation.
segments.client_message: I’m employed at the moment, working as a software developer with ABC Corp, I started there a year ago. My National Insurance number? Uh, let me think... it’s something like QQ123456C.
